did.unittitle: Post Office Arbitration Files 1971-1984
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.p: These arbitration files are coded to indicate what is included in the file: TR = Transcript(s) B = Brief EX = Exhibit(s) AN = Arbitrator's Notes RC = Routine Correspondence A = Agreement SD = Supporting Document(s)

controlaccess.corpname: United States Postal Service. Eastern Region.

controlaccess.subject: Hours of labor.
Grievance arbitration.
Insubordination.
Violence in the workplace.
Absenteeism (Labor)
Alcoholism and employment.
Occupations -- Classification.
Drugs and employment.
People with disabilities-- Employment.
Postal service -- Employees -- Salaries, etc.
Sick leave.
Strikes and lockouts.
Tardiness.
Employees -- Dismissal of.
Work environment.
Vacations, Employee.
Postal service -- Employees --Labor unions -- United States.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Post Office Arbitration Files #5739. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5269: United National Association of Post Office Craftsmen Records 5839: Vernon Jenson Additional Arbitration Files
